title: What She Needs
description: The author of The Bikini Diaries now invites readers to an erotic hotel where sensual satisfaction is the main amenity?Mild-mannered Jenna Banks never considered sex a recreational sport?until she wins a two-week stay at the notorious Hotel Erotique, where every sexual fantasy comes true?in room after room, with stranger after stranger. Even more unnerving for Jenna is Brent Powers, her wildly sensual personal guide who can?t wait to put his degree in sexual psychology to work. But with the steady seduction of Jenna come feelings that neither expected. Where will the ultimate fantasy take them?
author: Lacey Alexander
